review: Little jumpy at first but overall work flawlessly. Shows are crystal clear, even play board games with the family on it very fun.
author: josh

review: We are enjoying our fire sticks very much
author: angela

review: Having got the Fire TV Stick on the 19.99 deal through Prime, I was a little worried that the first iteration might struggle, but I was wrong. My Fire TV stick works really wonderfully, and I can't think of any issues I've had that were the fault of the hardware (the Hulu app seems to struggle but it is not an issue of the hardware). This is a great option for anyone looking to stream media to their tv.
author: Swalla

review: Great unit for the price and takes less than 5 minutes to install and have up and running. Couldn't ask for easier!!!
author: Mike Franqueiro

review: it doesnt have my provider on it which i have h2o bolt i can not use it to its full ability

review: Easy to set up and worked per the spec
